name: TuberculosisMammalianTuberculinSkinTest
title: Tuberculosis (Mammalian Tuberculin Skin Test)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Mycobacterium tuberculosis by Mammalian Tuberculin Skin Test),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: tuberculosis reaction wheal mammalian),(Exclusion Criteria: avian tuberculin or non mammalian tuberculin)
